title: Office Room:In every residential/non-residential building, constructed or proposed to be constructed for the use of a co-operative society or an apartment owners’/lessee’s association, an office room one for each societywill be permitted on tanyfloor or parking floors or stilt floor
clause_text: Office Room:In every residential/non-residential building, constructed or proposed to be constructed for the use of a co-operative society or an apartment owners’/lessee’s association, an office room one for each societywill be permitted on tanyfloor or parking floors or stilt floor. In an already developed property, it may be on an upper floor.The area of the room inclusive of toilet shall be limited to 20 sq. m.
